#30570 defines reachabilitySet for a SimpleGraph as the set of all pairs that have a walk between them.
reachabilitySet is to Reachable what edgeSet is to Adj (both related by Sym2.fromRel).

The main motivation is making it easier to work with the bridge definition (see isBridge_iff_mem_edgeSet_and_notMem_reachabilitySet_deleteEdges and mem_edgeSet_and_mem_reachabilitySet_deleteEdges_iff_exists_isCycle_and_mem_edges at the bottom of the PR).

Thoughts? This has been open for a month an a half, and is blocking #30640 and possibly also #31690
